deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 1 hr 10 mins

climatePledgeFriendly.details: EWG Verified products are reviewed to ensure they are free from EWG’s known chemicals of concern and adhere to strict health standards.

features: One 11 oz. bottle of Avalon Organics Natural Strengthening Peppermint Shampoo
Gently cleanses and replenishes weak, brittle hair
Certified organic formula made with plant-based botanicals and essential oils
No GMOs, parabens, harsh preservatives, synthetic colors or fragrances, or phthalates
Always cruelty-free, never tested on animals; recognized by the Leaping Bunny Program
body.description: Gently cleanse and replenish weak, brittle hair with Avalon Organics Strengthening Peppermint Shampoo. Made with plant-sourced botanicals and essential oils, this certified organic formula repairs elasticity and smooths split-ends and flyaways. Peppermint essential oil, quinoa protein, calendula, babassu oil, aloe and vitamin E work together to nourish and seal the hair cuticle for stronger hair with renewed bounce and length. This EWG VERIFIED shampoo is made with non-GMO ingredients and no parabens, harsh preservatives, synthetic colors or fragrances, or phthalates. It is also vegan and not tested on animals. Includes one 11 oz. bottle of Avalon Organics Strengthening Peppermint Shampoo. Curated from nature’s pure resources, Avalon Organics NSF organic certified skin care, hair care and bath & body products are deep-rooted in a profound respect for the earth. Combining modern science with the botanical world, we constantly strive to perfect each formula, evolve expertise and deliver innovation. Searching out the beautifying benefits hidden within each plant, Avalon Organics thoughtfully develops formulas to not only nourish the body, but also nourish the mind and the soul.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Deep Rooted Beauty Curated from nature’s pure resources, Avalon Organics NSF organic certified skin care, hair care and bath & body products are deep-rooted in a profound respect for the earth. Combining modern science with the botanical world, we constantly strive to perfect each formula, evolve expertise and deliver innovation. Searching out the beautifying benefits hidden within each plant, Avalon Organics thoughtfully develops formulas to not only nourish the body, but also nourish the mind and the soul.

Driven by a dedication to organic agriculture and formula transparency, all Avalon Organics products are certified to the NSF/ANSI 305 Standard for Personal Care Products Containing Organic Ingredients*. Through this honest, transparent process, the Avalon Organics brand creates products that are safe, effective and conscious of the greater good. *Claim approval was given on April 11, 2011 from QAI with certificate ID C01655324-NSF3HNPC-5.

Humbled by a profound respect for all living beings, Avalon Organics products are vegan and cruelty-free.* The Avalon Organics brand never tests products on animals, and will only source ingredients that the supplier can document are not tested on animals. This commitment to kindness is represented by the leaping bunny logo that appears on product labels. *Cruelty free certified by the CCIC on October 1st, 2008

Avalon Organics Rosemary Shampoo, 32 fl oz Avalon Organics Rosemary Conditioner, 32 fl. oz Avalon Organics Shampoo, Clarifying Lemon, 11 Oz Avalon Organics Conditioner, Clarifying Lemon, 11 Oz More Hair Care Products from Avalon Organics Formulated for thin and limp hair, this shampoo, containing a medley of Rosemary Essential Oil, Quinoa Protein, Calendula, Aloe and Vitamin E, thoroughly cleanses hair while reinforcing volume from root to tip. Formulated for thin and limp hair, this conditioner, containing a medley of Rosemary Essential Oil, Quinoa Protein, Calendula, Aloe and Vitamin E, lightly conditions hair while reinforcing volume from root to tip. Restore natural highlights and shine to dull, lackluster hair with Avalon Organics Clarifying Lemon Shampoo. Restore natural highlights and shine to dull, lackluster hair with Avalon Organics Clarifying Lemon Conditioner.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Yum scent and silky soft hair
reviews.reviewText: This is a favorite shampoo with a delicious perfect peppermint scent and it makes my hair so silky soft! I ordered three bottles and they arrived tightly wrapped and packed really well. No spills or issues. Fast shipping too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love this product
reviews.reviewText: Smells fabulous, my hair feels silky and soft, and the quality is the best I have found in eco-friendly, health-conscious brands.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great shampoo, but the cap always leaks during shipping
reviews.reviewText: The shampoo is great, I really like it. The only recurring problem is the cap. No matter how tight it is screwed on, it leaks between the bottle and the cap. Always a mess in the transport pouch and about an ounce is wasted every time. This time the cap was not even screwed on properly ... bigger mess. It's a shame.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Feels good with a subtle coolness. Smells great. Lathers well. Rinses easily. Cleans well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My hair smells great after using this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Me cambio el cabello
reviews.reviewText: Compré este producto buscando algo que me diera tonificación al cabello para mis canas es decir me pusiera el cabello más oscuro. Llevo usándolo como dos meses ayer en una video llamada aún amigo que no veo en un año me dijo que lindo tienes el pelo te aumento no se te ven las canas. Hoy mi barbero dijo lo mismo y me di la tarea de preguntar todos me dijeron es verdad. Es increíble esta es la primera vez que hablo de algo en mis 47 años nunca lo había echo soy cubano llevo en usa un año no le estoy dando propaganda pero tengo que decir la verdad es genial. Quiero hacer un video y ya se lo he recomendado a tres amigos los cuales lo han comprado vale la pena te cambia el cabello

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars IT'S JUST AVERAGE
reviews.reviewText: It lathers up and washes your hair clean; nothing sets it apart from any other shampoo. The peppermint fragrance was a mild imitation smell. It missed the mark of my expectations by 90%. A small whiff of something meant to smell like mint. It's an acceptable clean that does an average job. For the price of purchase it's not worth the value. If I can buy cheaper for 'any old shampoo' that does the same exact job as this product there's no value in its purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Its a good product. I shave my head and needed a decent oil-based shampoo to use once a week or so. It works well for my scalp and isn't half bad as a beard shampoo either.
It smells deliciously refreshing in the morning. It works great and gets the grease and grime right out of my hair.
Bien sans plus, je n'ai vu aucune différence avec mon ancien shampooing les cheveux graissent toujours autant

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 28, 2021

reviews.reviewText: The shampoo is good and gives a cooling effect after hair wash.But, the bottle was not sealed and the contents were only 3/4.
